output

Class GanttChart.Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • output.GanttChart.Record
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GanttChart.Record>
    Enclosing class:
    GanttChart

    public class GanttChart.Record
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<GanttChart.Record>
    Record of each task in the Gantt chart. Note : make sure that for each processor index the name is the same. We don't check if names are same or not.

                 int processorIndex,
                 long startTime,
                 long endTime,

                 int colorIndex)
        Build a record for Gantt chart
        Parameters:
        processorName - name of the processor
        processorIndex - index of the processor
        startTime - start time of the task
        endTime - end time of the task
        actorName - name of the task
        colorIndex - index of the color in color book.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(GanttChart.Record anotherInstance)
        Compare record with another record. We compare a task with other task. If the names are equal then we compare instance ids. anotherInstance another record to compare
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<GanttChart.Record>
